Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed near Howard
ShortDescription:
Yellow Line trains are standing near Howard due to debris on the tracks. 

Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing near Howard due to debris on the tracks. 

Shuttle Buses have been requested from the areas of Howard to Skokie Dempster to provide connecting service through the effective area.

Crews working to restore service.
